hero.headline:
Intelligence That
Moves at the Speed
of Your Business
hero.subheadline: Nexora unifies your data streams into a single predictive intelligence layer — so your team spends less time analyzing and more time acting.

features.headline: Everything your analytics stack needs
features.subheadline: Built for modern data teams who need speed, accuracy, and confidence at every decision point.

realtime.title: Real-Time Intelligence
realtime.description: Process millions of events per second with sub-50ms latency. Your dashboards update as fast as your users act.

prediction.title: Predictive Modeling
prediction.description: Leverage pre-trained ML models that learn from your data patterns and surface actionable forecasts automatically.

collaboration.title: Team Collaboration
collaboration.description: Shared workspaces, version-controlled queries, and granular permissions built for cross-functional data teams.

integrations.title: 200+ Integrations
integrations.description: Connect your existing stack in minutes. Native connectors for Snowflake, Databricks, BigQuery, Kafka, and more.

security.title: Enterprise Security
security.description: SOC 2 Type II certified. End-to-end encryption, SSO, SCIM provisioning, and full audit logs included.

api.title: Developer-First API
api.description: RESTful and GraphQL APIs with SDKs for every major language. Embed Nexora intelligence into any product.

pricing.headline: Start free, scale without limits
pricing.subheadline: No hidden fees. No complex tiers. Choose the plan that fits your team today.

starter.name: Starter
starter.description: Perfect for indie hackers and small projects.

growth.name: Growth
growth.description: For growing teams that need more power and support.

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.description: For large organizations with complex requirements.

items.quote: Nexora replaced three separate tools we were using. The predictive layer alone saved us 40 hours of analyst time every week.
items.author: Sarah Chen

items.quote: The RTL support and Arabic localization made Nexora the only platform we could actually deploy for our MENA customers.
items.author: Omar Al-Rashid

items.quote: We went from 2-day report cycles to real-time dashboards in under a week. The onboarding is exceptional.
items.author: Marcus Webb

cta.headline: Ready to move at the speed of your data?
cta.subheadline: Join thousands of teams already using Nexora to make faster, smarter decisions.
cta.primary: Start for Free — No card required

demo.title: Live Analytics Dashboard
demo.subtitle: Experience Nexora's intelligence layer in real-time

blog.title: Nexora Blog
blog.subtitle: Insights on data intelligence, analytics engineering, and building at scale.

footer.tagline: The intelligence layer for modern data teams.

404.title: Signal Lost
404.description: This data stream doesn't exist — or it was moved to another dimension of the dashboard.
